name: Zero-Click Template Pack
description: A comprehensive collection of 15 templates, guides, checklists, and worksheets to build and manage a complete zero-click optimization system. Includes 4 advanced templates (HTML, JSON, Catalog, Agent Routing), 6 in-depth guides, 2 optimization checklists, and 2 technical worksheets for developers and agencies.
short_description: 15-file implementation toolkit for building complete zero-click optimization systems.
capabilities: Build a full zero-click product discovery system
Create agent routing maps for multi-agent systems
Deploy Schema.org markup for maximum AI visibility
Test and validate AI search optimization

does: Includes HTML, JSON, and catalog templates
Contains step-by-step setup and testing guides

delivery.contents: 15 files: 6 guides, 4 templates, 2 checklists, 2 worksheets, 1 START_HERE.pdf
